channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【The crawl before the fall… of referrals: understanding AI’s impact on content providers】秋天之前的爬网…推荐：了解AI对内容提供商的影响
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now shows how often a given AI model sends traffic to a site relative to how often it crawls that site. This helps site owners make decisions about which AI bots to allow or block. 】现在，CloudFlare Radar显示给定AI模型的频率相对于该站点爬网的频率将流量发送到站点。这有助于站点所有者决定允许或阻止哪种AI机器人。

item.title: 【Introducing pay per crawl: enabling content owners to charge AI crawlers for access】引入每次爬网薪水：使内容所有者能够向AI爬网收费以访问
item.description: 【 Pay per crawl is a new feature to allow content creators to charge AI crawlers for access to their content. 】薪酬是一项新功能，可以允许内容创建者向AI爬网收费以访问其内容。

item.title: 【From Googlebot to GPTBot: who’s crawling your site in 2025】从Googlebot到GPTBOT：谁在2025年爬上您的网站
item.description: 【 From May 2024 to May 2025, crawler traffic rose 18%, with GPTBot growing 305% and Googlebot 96%. 】从2024年5月到2025年5月，Crawler交通增长了18％，GPTBOT增长了305％，Googlebot增长了96％。

item.title: 【Content Independence Day: no AI crawl without compensation!】内容独立日：没有赔偿的没有AI爬网！
item.description: 【 It’s Content Independence Day: Cloudflare, along with a majority of the world's leading publishers and AI companies, is changing the default to block AI crawlers unless they pay creators for content. 】这是独立日：CloudFlare以及世界上大多数领先的出版商和AI公司，都在将默认设置更改为阻止AI爬行者，除非他们向创作者支付内容。

item.title: 【Message Signatures are now part of our Verified Bots Program, simplifying bot authentication】消息签名现在是我们经过验证的机器人程序的一部分，简化了机器人身份验证
item.description: 【 Bots can start authenticating to Cloudflare using public key cryptography, preventing them from being spoofed and allowing origins to have confidence in their identity. 】机器人可以使用公共密钥密码学开始对CloudFlare进行身份验证，从而阻止它们被欺骗，并使起源对其身份有信心。

item.title: 【Orange Me2eets: We made an end-to-end encrypted video calling app and it was easy】橙色ME2Eets：我们制作了一个端到端的加密视频通话应用程序，这很容易
item.description: 【 Orange Meets, our open-source video calling web application, now supports end-to-end encryption using the MLS protocol with continuous group key agreement. 】Orange Meets是我们的开源视频调用Web应用程序，现在使用MLS协议和连续的组密钥协议支持端到端加密。

item.title: 【Celebrate Micro-Small, and Medium-sized Enterprises Day with Cloudflare 】与Cloudflare一起庆祝微型小男友和中型企业日
item.description: 【 To celebrate United Nations Micro, Small, and Medium Sized Enterprises Day, Cloudflare is sharing success stories of small businesses building and growing on our platform. 】为了庆祝联合国微型，中小型企业日，Cloudflare正在分享我们平台上建造和发展的小型企业的成功案例。

item.title: 【Building agents with OpenAI and Cloudflare’s Agents SDK】与OpenAI和Cloudflare代理SDK建造代理商
item.description: 【 We’re building AI agents where logic and reasoning are handled by OpenAI’s Agents SDK, and execution happens across Cloudflare's global network via Cloudflare’s Agents SDK. 】我们正在建立AI代理，在该代理商中，OpenAI代理SDK处理逻辑和推理，并且通过CloudFlare的代理SDK在Cloudflare的全球网络中进行了执行。

item.title: 【Russian Internet users are unable to access the open Internet】俄罗斯互联网用户无法访问开放的互联网
item.description: 【 Since June 9, 2025, Internet users located in Russia and connecting to the open Internet have been throttled by Russian Internet Service Providers (ISPs). 】自2025年6月9日以来，俄罗斯互联网服务提供商（ISP）促进了位于俄罗斯的互联网用户并连接到开放式互联网。

item.title: 【Control content use for AI training with Cloudflare’s managed robots.txt and blocking for monetized content】使用CloudFlare的托管机器人的AI培训的控制内容用途，并阻止货币化内容
item.description: 【 Cloudflare is making it easier for publishers and content creators of all sizes to prevent their content from being scraped for AI training by managing robots.txt on their behalf. 】CloudFlare使出版商和所有规模的内容创建者更容易通过代表他们管理Robots.txt来防止其内容进行AI培训。
